section.p: Becoming an initiate of Sig gives you the benefit of paying less for blessings and other services. Also, you can add 1 to your THIEVERY score, as Sig will watch over your pilfering activities and keep you safe from the law. It costs 50 Shards to become an initiate. You cannot become an initiate if you are already an initiate of any other temple.

if.if:
If you choose to become an initiate,
write 'Sig' in the God box
on your Adventure Sheet - and cross off 50 Shards.
